description: Needs a supplier that can deliver a high-quality Combined Shredder/Degausser that can destroy mechanical hard drive platters and electronic hard drives, as well as cell phones. Any interested Supplier can send their proposals. This announcement is expired so the last date to submit an offer was April 12th, 2024.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Details

* **Title (English)**: Acquisition of a Combined Degausser and Disintegrator (NSA Approved)
* **Title (French)**: Acquisition d'un démagnétiseur et d'un déchiqueteur combinés (approuvé par la NSA)
* **Reference Number**: WS4264226991-Doc4466061467
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4264226991
* **Publication Date**: February 28, 2024

## Tender Information

* **Bid Closing Date**: April 12, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Status**: Closed
* **Contract Duration**: Anticipated Start Date: N/A, Anticipated End Date: November 14, 2024

## Contract Overview

The Government of Canada invites bids to supply a combined shredder/degausser capable of destroying mechanical (platter) and electronic hard drives (SSD), as well as mobile phones. The proposed system must meet NSA standards for data security and destruction.

## Deliverables

* A combined shredder/degausser system capable of destroying the following items:
	+ Mechanical (platter) hard drives
	+ Electronic hard drives (SSD)
	+ Mobile phones
* The system must meet NSA standards for data security and destruction

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Point of Contact**: Anthony Mitch, mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice and Document Links

* Notice of Intent: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18935516?extsite=MTg5MzU1MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18935516?extsite=MTg5MzU1MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note that the UNSPSC and procurement category remain unchanged from the original entry, but we have rephrased and rewritten the text in a more professional and concise manner.

Let me know if you need further assistance! You can format your response in markdown if you wish! 

Here's the snippet I included at the very top. If there is an area you'd like to spend more time fixing or have questions, please
